body: The latter should work well enough for what the marketing and engagement teams want. But I have a question about the first method. Normandy client looks at the most recent main ping, right? So does that mean that normandy.telemetry.creationDate is alwasys a fairly recent date? And if yes, can we actually use that to infer the amount of time the user has been inactive for? I.e. the approximate time between the last time the user has used Firefox and their current session.
